metadata.title: CVE-2019-14881 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in moodle 3.7 before 3.7.3, where there is blindXSS reflected in some locations where user email is displayed.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
